    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException,
                        InvalidPathException
        Main method to run this class If number of args is two, create implementation of given class and put it to given path. If number of args is three, create implementation of given class, pack it in .jar file and put it to given path.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments from command line "-jar classname path" for implement class and pack it in .jar "classname path" for implement class
        Throws:
        info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if args is wrong or if classname is wrong
        InvalidPathException - if path is invalid
        See Also:
        implement(Class, Path), implementJar(Class, Path), ImplerException

      • implement

        public void implement(Class<?> token,
                      Path root)
               throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException,
                      InvalidPathException
        Method to generate implementation Creates a file that correctly implements or extends interface or class. Output files compiles without errors.
        Specified by:
        implement in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler
        Parameters:
        token - class or interface, which is going to be implemented
        root - directory where implementation should be placed to
        Throws:
        info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if arguments is wrong or if class is primitive or private or hasn't non-private constructors or if can't create directory or implementation file in given pass
        InvalidPathException - if path is invalid
        See Also:
        writeClass(Class, BufferedWriter), ImplerException

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(Class<?> token,
                         Path jarPath)
                  throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException,
                         InvalidPathException
        Method to generate implementation and pack it into .jar file Takes given class. Makes implementation and tries to compile it. If the compilation finish without errors, tries to make JAR file of the compiled byte-code
        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - class for implement
        jarPath - directory where .jar should be placed to
        Throws:
        info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if arguments is wrong or if compilation finish with error or if can't create .jar file in given directory
        InvalidPathException - if path is invalid
        See Also:
        implement(Class, Path), ImplerException
